pages.text: $(li)The Dead Bush is a block that can be found in the $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/desert)Deserts$(/l), $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/dunes)Dunes$(/l), and $(l:patchouli:biomes/overworld/desert/badlands)Badlands$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to breed $(l:patchouli:pets/alexsmobs/kangaroo)Kangaroos$(/l).$(br)$(li)This item can only be obtained breaking this block while you are holding a pair of $(l:patchouli:tools/vanilla/shears)Shears$(/l) in your hand.
